article_title: WH Refuses to Apologize to 800,000 Americans Hit By Obamacare Tax Glitch
article_text:
WH Refuses to Apologize to 800,000 Americans Hit By Obamacare Tax Glitch

White House press secretary Josh Earnest twice refused to apologize to the estimate 800,000 Americans who were hit by the latest Obamacare glitch:

Americans "should expect government officials to step forward and solve" the problem, Earnest said, refusing to apologize after being given the chance twice.
